Etymology[edit]

From French restaurant.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˌʁɛstoˈʁãː/, /-ˈʁaŋ/, /-ˈʁɔŋ/
  • audio
    		(file)
  • Hyphenation: Re‧s‧tau‧rant
  • Rhymes: -ãː, -aŋ, -ɔŋ

Noun[edit]

Restaurant n (genitive Restaurants, plural Restaurants)

  1. restaurant
